mapper.select: INSERT INTO SGT_ORDER (ORDER_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, PRICE, TUMBLER_ID) VALUES (NEXTVAL('SGT_ORDER_SEQ'), #{ account_id }, #{ price }, #{ tumbler_id }) RETURNING ORDER_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, TUMBLER_ID, PRICE

INSERT INTO SGT_ORDERDETAILS (ORDER_ID, LINE_ID, MENU_ID, SHOT, SYRUP, WHIPPED_CREAM, DRIZZLE, SIZE, OPTION_SUM, MENU_CNT, PRICE, PRIVATE_MENU_YN, IS_TUMBLER) VALUES (#{ order_id }, #{ line_id }, #{ menu_id }, #{ shot }, #{ syrup }, #{ whipped_cream }, #{ drizzle }, #{ size }, #{ option_sum }, #{ menu_cnt }, #{ price }, #{ private_menu_yn }, #{ is_tumbler })

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT M.MENU_NAME, (CASE OD.SIZE WHEN 'T' THEN 'Tall' WHEN 'G' THEN 'Grande' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Venti' END) SIZE, O.ORDER_ID, O.TUMBLER_ID, O.ORDER_TIME ORDER_TIME, O.STORE_NAME STORE_NAME, O.PRICE PRICE, O.ACCOUNT_ID, OD.DRIZZLE, OD.IS_TUMBLER, OD.LINE_ID, OD.MENU_CNT, OD.MENU_ID, OD.OPTION_SUM, OD.PRIVATE_MENU_YN, OD.SHOT, OD.SYRUP, OD.WHIPPED_CREAM, OD.PRICE AS DETAIL_PRICE FROM SGT_ORDER O JOIN SGT_ORDERDETAILS OD ON O.ORDER_ID = OD.ORDER_ID JOIN SGT_MENU M ON OD.MENU_ID = M.MENU_ID WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{ accountId } AND OD.IS_TUMBLER = TRUE ) AS RO ORDER BY RO.ORDER_TIME DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT M.MENU_NAME, (CASE OD.SIZE WHEN 'T' THEN 'Tall' WHEN 'G' THEN 'Grande' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Venti' END) SIZE, O.ORDER_ID, O.TUMBLER_ID, O.ORDER_TIME ORDER_TIME, O.STORE_NAME STORE_NAME, O.PRICE PRICE, O.ACCOUNT_ID, OD.DRIZZLE, OD.IS_TUMBLER, OD.LINE_ID, OD.MENU_CNT, OD.MENU_ID, OD.OPTION_SUM, OD.PRIVATE_MENU_YN, OD.SHOT, OD.SYRUP, OD.WHIPPED_CREAM, OD.PRICE AS DETAIL_PRICE FROM SGT_ORDER O JOIN SGT_ORDERDETAILS OD ON O.ORDER_ID = OD.ORDER_ID JOIN SGT_MENU M ON OD.MENU_ID = M.MENU_ID WHERE TUMBLER_ID = #{ tumblerId } AND OD.IS_TUMBLER = TRUE ) AS RO ORDER BY RO.ORDER_TIME DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT M.MENU_NAME, (CASE OD.SIZE WHEN 'T' THEN 'Tall' WHEN 'G' THEN 'Grande' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Venti' END) SIZE, O.ORDER_TIME ORDER_TIME, TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_TIME,'HH:mm:SS') ORDER_TIME2, O.STORE_NAME STORE_NAME, O.PRICE PRICE, OD.PRICE AS DETAIL_PRICE, OD.DRIZZLE, OD.SHOT, OD.SYRUP, OD.WHIPPED_CREAM FROM SGT_ORDER O JOIN SGT_ORDERDETAILS OD ON O.ORDER_ID = OD.ORDER_ID JOIN SGT_MENU M ON OD.MENU_ID = M.MENU_ID WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{ accountId } AND OD.IS_TUMBLER = TRUE ) AS RO ORDER BY RO.ORDER_TIME DESC LIMIT 1
